lines.text: My daughter, Do you hate me?
No , I love you very much mother.
I was afraid you hated me.
I hated you sometimes, but even on those times I never stop loving you.

[during Interrogation]
You don't kill a daughter's husband two days before your theatrical debut!

[announcing her husband's murder on the television news]
According to the autopsy, the victim had had sexual relations shortly before he died. I can only add it was not with me.
